com.netflix.governator.guice.jetty

Class JettyModule.JettyShutdown

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.governator.AbstractLifecycleListener
      • com.netflix.governator.guice.jetty.JettyModule.JettyShutdown
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifecycleListener
    Enclosing class:
    JettyModule

    public static class JettyModule.JettyShutdown
extends AbstractLifecycleListener
    LifecycleListener to stop Jetty Server. This will catch shutting down Jetty when notified only through LifecycleManager#shutdown() and not via the LifecycleEvent#shutdown().
    Author:
    elandau
